definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Jinhongri knitting manufactory locates in Guangzhou, the delta hinterland along the pearl river.
sentences.chinese: 金紅日織造廠位於珠江三角洲腹地的廣州市。

sentences.english: Hong Kong must integrate with the delta to stay competitive with northern and eastern China.
sentences.chinese: 香港必須和珠江三角洲整合，才能和華北及華東競爭。

sentences.english: On the Flood Control Measures in Zhujiang Delta;
sentences.chinese: 分析了珠江三角洲網河區水位變化特徵。

sentences.english: Guangfu clan and hakka clan are the two main parts in Pearl River Delta area.
sentences.chinese: 廣府和客家爲珠江三角洲地區兩大主要民系。

sentences.english: Is one of the communication and commercial centers within the pearl River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 珠江三角洲內的交通和商業中心之一，鎮內有。

sentences.english: In the past year, chill winds have blown through the Pearl River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 過去一年中，寒風吹遍了珠江三角洲。

sentences.english: The Pearl river delta – the nation's industrial hub – is also being affected.
sentences.chinese: 珠江三角洲，中國的工業中心，也受到了影響。

sentences.english: In recent years, the investment in Pearl River Habor by overseas people increased 4 times.
sentences.chinese: 海外人士近年來在珠江三角洲的投資翻了兩番。

sentences.english: It is expected areas near the Pearl River Delta region will continue bracing for storms Monday.
sentences.chinese: 預計23日珠江三角洲周邊市縣仍有暴雨。
